mapper.sql: r.id AS reservationId, r.goods_mapping_id AS goodsMappingId, r.goods_id AS goodsId, r.beautician_id AS beauticianId, r.user_id AS userId, r.user_name AS userName, r.user_phone AS userPhone, r.appt_date AS apptDate, r.appt_start_time AS apptStartTime, r.appt_end_time AS apptEndTime, r.shop_id AS shopId, r.appt_status AS apptStatus, r.create_date, r.remarks, r.user_note AS userNote, r.channel_flag AS channelFlag, r.service_start_time AS serviceStartTime, r.service_end_time AS serviceEndTime
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order WHERE beautician_id = #{id} AND appt_status = 0

SELECT , m.goods_name AS 'goods.goodsName', a.name AS 'user.name', o.name AS 'office.name', o.id AS 'office.id' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order AS r LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office AS o ON r.shop_id = o.id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user AS a ON r.beautician_id = a.id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping AS m ON r.goods_mapping_id = m.rec_id WHERE 1=1 AND r.id = #{reservationId }

SELECT mao.id AS reservationId, mg.goods_name AS 'goods.goodsName', su.`no` AS 'user.no', mg.goods_sn AS 'goods.goodsSn', mao.appt_date AS apptDate, mao.appt_status AS apptStatus, su.`name` AS 'user.name', sui.teachers_star_level AS 'teachersStarLevel' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order mao LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user su ON mao.beautician_id = su.id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_goods mg ON mao.goods_id = mg.goods_id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user_info sui ON su.id = sui.user_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_customer mc ON mc.user_id = mao.user_id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office o1 ON o1.id = mao.office_id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office o2 ON o2.id = mao.bea_office_id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office o3 ON o3.id = mao.shop_id WHERE mao.user_id= #{userId} AND mc.franchisee_id = #{franchiseeId} AND (( locate( #{franchiseeIds}, concat(o1.parent_ids, o1.id) ) > 0 ) or ( locate( #{franchiseeIds}, concat(o2.parent_ids, o2.id) ) > 0 ) or ( locate( #{franchiseeIds}, concat(o3.parent_ids, o3.id) ) > 0 )) GROUP BY mao.id ORDER BY mao.create_date DESC

SELECT b.comm_id AS commentId, b.beauty_id AS beautyId, b.user_id AS userId, b.is_show AS isShow, b.content AS contents, b.img, b.beauty_rank AS goodsRank, b.add_time AS addTime, b.parent_id AS parentId, u.nickname AS 'users.name', cu.name AS 'user.name' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_beauty_comment AS b LEFT OUTER JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users AS u ON b.user_id = u.user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN trains.sys_user AS cu ON b.reply_id = cu.id WHERE 1=1 b.reservation_id = #{reservationId} ORDER BY b.add_time ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order WHERE shop_id = #{id} AND appt_status = 0;

SELECT ogm.rec_id, ogm.order_id, ogm.user_id, ogm.goods_name, ogm.goods_id, ogm.goods_sn, ogm.goods_num, ogm.goods_price, ogm.spec_key, ogm.spec_key_name, ogm.service_times, ogm.service_min, ogm.original_img, ogm.is_real, ogm.add_time, ogm.reality_add_time, ogm.advance_price,g.franchisee_id,g.position_id,g.position_ids, CASE WHEN ogm.is_real = 2 THEN CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details d WHERE d.order_id = ogm.order_id AND d.goods_mapping_id = ogm.rec_id AND d.advance_flag = 1) > 0 THEN (SELECT 1 - COUNT(1) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order ao WHERE ao.group_id = ogm.rec_id AND ao.appt_status != 3) ELSE ((SELECT SUM(m.service_times - m.after_sale_num) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping m WHERE m.group_id = ogm.rec_id AND m.order_id = ogm.order_id AND m.is_real = 1) - (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order ao WHERE ao.group_id = ogm.rec_id AND ao.appt_status != 3)) END ELSE (SELECT SUM(d.service_times) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details d WHERE d.goods_mapping_id = ogm.rec_id AND d.order_id = ogm.order_id) END AS remain_times, (SELECT SUM(d.app_arrearage) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details d WHERE d.goods_mapping_id = ogm.rec_id AND d.order_id = ogm.order_id) AS account_arrearage, (SELECT SUM(d.surplus_amount) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details d WHERE d.goods_mapping_id = ogm.rec_id AND d.order_id = ogm.order_id) AS surplus_amount, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details d WHERE d.goods_mapping_id = ogm.rec_id AND d.order_id = ogm.order_id AND d.advance_flag = 1) AS advance_flag, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order ao WHERE ao.group_id = ogm.rec_id AND ao.appt_status != 3) AS cards_used_num, (SELECT group_concat(skill_id) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_goods_skill s WHERE s.goods_id = g.goods_id GROUP BY goods_id) AS 'skillId', (SELECT group_concat(label_id) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_goods_equipment e WHERE e.goods_id = g.goods_id GROUP BY goods_id) AS 'labelId' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping ogm LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_orders o ON o.order_id = ogm.order_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_goods g ON g.goods_id = ogm.goods_id WHERE o.order_status in (1,2,4) AND ogm.is_real != 0 AND ogm.user_id = #{userId} AND ogm.group_id = 0 AND DATE_FORMAT(date_add(ogm.reality_add_time,INTERVAL ogm.expiring_date MONTH),'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d') HAVING remain_times != 0 ORDER BY account_arrearage DESC,ogm.add_time DESC

SELECT m.rec_id AS 'recId', m.group_id AS 'groupId', m.goods_id AS 'goodsId', m.goods_name AS 'goodsName', m.original_img AS 'originalImg', m.goods_num AS 'goodsNum', m.single_reality_price AS 'price', m.service_min AS 'serviceMin', m.is_real AS 'isReal', m.service_times AS 'serviceTimes', (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order ao WHERE ao.goods_mapping_id = m.rec_id AND ao.appt_status != 3) AS 'usedNum', g.franchisee_id AS 'franchiseeId', (SELECT group_concat(skill_id) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_goods_skill s WHERE s.goods_id = g.goods_id GROUP BY goods_id) AS 'skillId', (SELECT group_concat(label_id) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_goods_equipment e WHERE e.goods_id = g.goods_id GROUP BY goods_id) AS 'labelId', g.position_id AS 'positionId', g.position_ids AS 'positionIds' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping m LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_goods g ON g.goods_id = m.goods_id WHERE m.group_id = #{value} AND m.is_real = 1

SELECT id, beautician_id, shop_id, gd.service_min FROM mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order re LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_goods gd ON gd.goods_id = re.goods_id WHERE re.appt_status = 0 AND DATE_ADD(CONCAT(re.appt_date,' ',re.appt_start_time),INTERVAL gd.service_min+60 MINUTE) < NOW()
mapper.update: UPDATE mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order SET appt_status = 1, update_date = SYSDATE() WHERE id = #{appt_id} AND appt_status = 0
mapper.select: SELECT r.id AS reservationId, r.service_start_time AS serviceStartTime, r.service_end_time AS serviceEndTime FROM mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order r WHERE r.id = #{reservationId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order_log ( appt_id, title, content, content_record, channel_flag, platform_flag, create_by, create_office_ids, create_date ) VALUES ( #{reservationId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{contentRecord}, #{channelFlag}, #{platformFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createOfficeIds}, SYSDATE() );
mapper.select: SELECT a.title, a.content, a.channel_flag AS channelFlag, a.platform_flag AS platformFlag, b.`name` AS 'createby.name', a.create_date FROM mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order_log AS a LEFT JOIN trains.sys_user AS b ON a.create_by = b.id WHERE a.appt_id = #{reservationId} ORDER BY a.create_date DESC

SELECT , ogd1.goods_mapping_id AS 'detailsMappingId', r.group_id AS 'groupId', ogd1.order_id AS 'orderId', r.update_date AS 'updateDate', IFNULL(r.update_by,1) AS 'updateBy.id' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order r LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details ogd1 ON ogd1.appt_id = r.id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details ogd2 ON ogd2.order_id = ogd1.order_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_orders o ON ogd2.order_id = o.order_id WHERE (r.appt_status = 1 OR r.appt_status = 4) AND DATE_FORMAT(r.update_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') > DATE_FORMAT(#{lastTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND DATE_FORMAT(r.update_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND ((ogd2.advance_flag = 2 AND DATE_FORMAT(ogd2.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') > DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')) or (ogd2.advance_flag = 1)) AND o.channel_flag != 'bm' ORDER BY r.update_date,r.id

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order WHERE beautician_id = #{beauticianId} AND DATE_FORMAT(appt_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{apptDate},'%Y-%m-%d') AND appt_status IN (0,1,2) AND ( ( DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(appt_date,' ',appt_start_time),'%H:%i') < DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{apptDate},'%Y-%m-%d'),' ',#{apptStartTime}),'%H:%i') AND DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{apptDate},'%Y-%m-%d'),' ',#{apptStartTime}),'%H:%i') < DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(appt_date,' ',appt_end_time),'%H:%i') ) OR ( DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{apptDate},'%Y-%m-%d'),' ',#{apptStartTime}),'%H:%i') <= DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(appt_date,' ',appt_start_time),'%H:%i') AND DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(appt_date,' ',appt_end_time),'%H:%i') <= DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{apptDate},'%Y-%m-%d'),' ',#{apptEndTime}),'%H:%i') ) OR ( DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(appt_date,' ',appt_start_time),'%H:%i') < DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{apptDate},'%Y-%m-%d'),' ',#{apptEndTime}),'%H:%i') AND DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(#{apptDate},'%Y-%m-%d'),' ',#{apptEndTime}),'%H:%i') < DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(appt_date,' ',appt_end_time),'%H:%i') ) ) AND id != #{reservationId}
